name: Wrath of the Dragon King: König's Revenge
name_original: Wrath of the Dragon King: König's Revenge
description:
Wrath of the Dragon King: König's Revenge is a 2D arcade, bullet hell with roguelike elements inspired by Luftrausers. The player takes control of König, a legless Dragon and eternal king of the Dragon Realm that comes through a portal. Take revenge on the human species who took your Legs, without them König can't take long walks on the beach which makes him incredibly angry.

Wreak havoc on the human realm using an assortment of Breaths, Bodies and Wings. Each one will drastically change how you play the game. You Will be taking on Tanks and Planes in intense aerial combat.

  • Take Revenge on the human realm because they chopped off your legs
  • Take to the sky with intense aerial combat
  • Burn down hordes of enemies and make the humans submit
  • Change body parts to change the way you play the game with 90 combinations to choose from!
  • Aim for the highest score possible by wreaking havoc

All you need is a mouse to select menu items and a keyboard for gameplay.

  • Up is used to Accelerate
  • Left and Right is used to Rotate
  • X is used to Fire Your Chosen Breath Weapon
  • Each wing type is a different way to play, So make up your favourite arsenal and wreak havoc

You are König, mighty king and ruler of dragon kind. Millennia ago you suffered an unforgivable transgression, one perpetrated by the humans. They have forever wounded you, they put you on the back foot with this most dishonorable of feats and thus you were brought to heel and so you retreated to the dragon realm with your kin in tow.

They did the unthinkable... They chopped of your legs!

What is a king with no legs. For a millennia you have been prevented from enjoying your eternally loved walks on the beach, you have been withheld from the joy of sand slipping between your toes. But now you are back, with a level of wrath only the king of dragons can muster, you have returned and vengeance will be yours.
